str2: A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
Hated, hostile; subst: an enemy. From a primary echtho; hateful; usually as a noun, an adversary.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
One of a family, whether child or servant. From oikia; familiar, i.e. relatives.
